message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you and the market value, I propose we set the price at $120. This allows us to share the value while ensuring you get a fair deal. Let me know if this works for you!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $120. I am willing to pay up to $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. This offers a slight compromise, allowing us to move forward with the transaction while still ensuring a reasonable return for the product. I look forward to your consideration.
